original_text: Jesus went into Peter's house. There, he saw the mother of Peter's wife. She was lying in bed. She was ill and her body was very hot.
korean_text: 예수께서 베드로의 집에 들어가사 그의 장모가 열병으로 앓아 누운 것을 보시고

sentences.original_text: There, he saw the mother of Peter's wife.
sentences.korean_translation: 거기서 그는 베드로의 아내의 어머니를 보셨다.

sentences.original_text: and her body was very hot.
